snippet: The hard work starts now for Bill de Blasio, the mayor-elect. He has promised a new approach in substance and style that voters clearly wanted.
abstract: Editorial warns New York City Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio that he faces a steep learning curve as he transitions from being a campaigning politician to a city manager; holds de Blasio must strike delicate balance between keeping city's vast machinery running smoothly while also changing its direction.
lead_paragraph: The hard work starts now for Bill de Blasio, the mayor-elect. He has promised a new approach in substance and style that voters clearly wanted.
